testCase.name: [TG-5] [Teodora] Successful Logout
testCase.objective: To validate that the the logout function works.
testCase.precondition:
We have successfully logged in http://poll-app7-20200409.softacad.bg/ with the provided username and password:
password: 123456
username: normalUser1

step.expectedResult: A drop-down menu should appear. One of the options should be Logout.
A message saying "You're successfully logged out" should appear.

testCase.name: [TG-5] [Teodora] Profile button functionality
testCase.objective: See if the Profile button works properly. Once clicked a drop-down menu should appear.
testCase.precondition:
User should be logged in with valid credentials.
password: 123456
username: normalUser1

step.expectedResult: The icon should be clickable and a drop-down menu should appear.

testCase.name: [TG-5] [Teodora] Logout after 60 minutes.
testCase.objective:
To validate that the user is logged out by the server after 60 minutes.
No automatic session validation logic is to be implemented; logout should be triggered upon new request to the server that requires authentication (e.g. vote in poll; create poll, etc.)
testCase.precondition:
We have successfully logged in with the provided username and password:
password: 123456
username: normalUser1

step.expectedResult: The app should ask for the userÂ´s credentials again.

issue.summary: [TG-5] [Teodora] No error message when full name has too many characters

testCase.name: [TG-5] [Teodora] [1.0.3] Signup Negative - full name with wrong character length
testCase.objective:
To find out if the application will allow a full name with less/more characters than is allowed according to the SRS. (The field shall accept minimum of 4 and maximum of 40 characters)
An error message should appear if the character length is wrong.

step.description: Click on the Full Name field and type a name that is 3 characters long.
step.expectedResult:
The border around the field should turn red and an error message should appear:
Name is too short (Minimum 4 characters needed.)

step.description: Click on the Full Name field and type a name that is 41 characters long.
step.expectedResult:
The border around the field should turn red and an error message should appear:
Name is too long (Maximum 40 characters needed.)

testCase.name: [TG-5] [Teodora] [1.0.3] Signup Negative - password with wrong character length
testCase.objective:
To find out if the application will allow a password with less/more characters than is allowed according to the SRS. (The field shall accept minimum of 6 and maximum of 20 characters )
An error message should appear if the character length is wrong.

step.description: Click on the Password field and type 5 characters,
step.expectedResult:
The border around the field should turn red and an error message should appear:
Password is too short (Minimum 6 characters needed.)

step.description: Click on the Password field and type 21 characters.
step.expectedResult:
The border around the field should turn red and an error message should appear:
Password is too long (Maximum 20 characters needed.)

testCase.name: [TG-5] [Teodora] [1.1.1] Registered users (normal account) - access to profile information
testCase.objective: To check if a registered user with a normal account has access to their profile.
testCase.precondition:
1.Navigate to http://poll-app7-20200409.softacad.bg/
2.Successfully logged in with valid credentials.

step.expectedResult: The icon is clickable. A drop-down menu appears.

The user is redirected to the poll review screen.
The following information should be available there:
  • user details (full name, username, join date)
  • votes stats

testCase.name: [TG-5] [Teodora] [1.1.1] Registered users (admin account) - access to profile information
testCase.objective: To check if a registered user with an admin account has access to their profile.
testCase.precondition:
1.Navigate to http://poll-app7-20200409.softacad.bg/
2.Successfully logged in with valid credentials.

step.expectedResult: The icon is clickable. A drop-down menu appears.

The user is redirected to the poll review screen.
The following information should be available there:
  • user details (full name, username, join date)
  • polls created stats
  • votes stats

testCase.name: [TG-5] [Teodora] [1.1.1] Successfully vote in open poll
testCase.objective:
To check if a normal user is able to vote in an open poll.
The user should not be able to vote twice in the same poll.
testCase.precondition:
1.Navigate to http://poll-app7-20200409.softacad.bg/polls
2.There is an open poll for voting
3.Successfully logged in with valid credentials.

step.description: Click on a choice from an active poll.
step.expectedResult: The choice should be clickable. The user should be able to see which choice he has marked.
The button is clickable and the the vote is registered. The choice made should be visible.

step.description: Vote in the same poll again.
step.expectedResult: The poll shouldn't allow a second vote.

issue.summary: As an admin, I want to be able to create new polls
[TG-5] [Teodora] Poll creation - wrong time in the review poll screen

testCase.name: [TG-5] [Teodora] [1.1.1] Admit account - poll creation
testCase.objective:
To check if a registered user with an admin account can create a new poll.
The poll needs to have text in the question field (The field shall accept maximum of 140 characters) and at least two choices in order to be created.
testCase.precondition:
1.Navigate to http://poll-app7-20200409.softacad.bg/
2.Successfully logged in with valid credentials.

step.description: Click on the New Poll icon.
step.expectedResult: The icon should be clickable and the user should be re-directed to the New Poll page: http://poll-app7-20200409.softacad.bg/poll/new

step.description: Write text in the question field that is less than 140 characters.
step.expectedResult: Text should appear on the filed. No error messages should appear.
step.testData: Do you like pineapple on pizza?

step.expectedResult: No errors.

step.description: Select length of the poll in days and hours.
step.expectedResult: The user shall be able to select them with no errors.

Button is clickable and a new poll is created.
The user is redirected to the review poll screen.

testCase.name: [TG-5] [Teodora] [1.1.1] Admit account - poll creation; error message when the maximum character length is exceeded
testCase.objective:
When registered user with an admin account creates a new poll he has to write a question with a maximum of 140 characters.
The objective of this test is to see if an error message appears when the question exceeds the limit of 140 characters.
testCase.precondition:
1.Navigate to http://poll-app7-20200409.softacad.bg/
2.Successfully logged in with valid credentials.
3. Navigate to http://poll-app7-20200409.softacad.bg/poll/new

step.description: Write text in the question field that is 141 characters.
step.expectedResult: The border of the field should become red and a message warning should appear that the question is too long, over 140 characters.

testCase.name: [TG-5] [Teodora] [1.1.1] Admit account - poll creation with only 1 choice
testCase.objective:
A poll needs at least two choices in order to be created.
The objective of this test is to see if a poll with one choice can be created.
testCase.precondition:
1.Navigate to http://poll-app7-20200409.softacad.bg/
2.Successfully logged in with valid credentials.
3. Navigate to http://poll-app7-20200409.softacad.bg/poll/new

step.expectedResult: The text appears; no error messages.
Choice appears.
A poll is not created; an error message appears.

testCase.name: [TG-5] [Teodora] [1.1.1] Admit account - poll creation; Add a choice button disabled after 6 choices
testCase.objective: To check if the the Add a choice is disabled after 6 choices are added to a poll in poll creation.
testCase.precondition:
1.Navigate to http://poll-app7-20200409.softacad.bg/
2.Successfully logged in with valid credentials.
3. Navigate to http://poll-app7-20200409.softacad.bg/poll/new

step.description: Write a question in the question field.
step.expectedResult: The text appears.

The choices are accepted and the Add a choice button is disabled.
More choices can't be added.
